```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)

mofo <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "mofo")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_0cbd64c0ff1870d28030ff654430a34d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(treat, yld))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_wrap(~study)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Histogram


::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_cc9d5acd0a540d73826444b3819427ac'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_5a82d21cdd73fd4ac0d63c7cee234020'}

```{.r .cell-code}
b <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_boxplot()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_2645c66ba25b045d345c43a41ec3bd44'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(patchwork)
```

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_2a8d6f6f05106404270c0af99b9d3aa3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
survey <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "survey")

survey |> 
  filter(state == "RS") |> 
  count(species, residue) |> 
  arrange(n) |> 
  rename(res = residue) |> 
  mutate(n_class = case_when(
          n < 30 ~ "baixa",
          TRUE ~ "Alta"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 4 × 4
  species res         n n_class
  <chr>   <chr>   <int> <chr>  
1 Fspp    corn       22 baixa  
2 Fspp    soybean    26 baixa  
3 Fgra    corn      147 Alta   
4 Fgra    soybean   255 Alta   
```
:::
:::
